"A.P.239/5/5":
"Hey Predecessor!
Why are you soo strong?"

"Umm...
I think it's all thanks to Xion, I guess?"

"Ah, fascinating!
By the way Predecessor, is that
a new weapon?"

"Who made it for you?
What's it like? Is it strong?"

"Umm... Yup. Xiao had asked
Zieg to make one for me."

"Every time I use normal weapon,
they break right away.
So, I don't know the difference to their usage."

"I know right!
By the way, how did you become a Predecessor? Were you chosen?"

"Umm... I was appointed to a vacant seat in the
Council of Six by Xion.
I think it was an absolute
order that time."

"I think I was around the same age
as you when I joined, Claris Claes."

"The same as me, yay!
It doesn't seem so bad now, hehe."

"Oh, it's you.
Have a look at that Claris Claes,
chattering like a bird."

"She kept saying that she had alot to talk about, and now she's been chattering helplessly
since we got back.
I can't even talk to her."

"I wouldn't say that
the present we gave her before was to close the gap
between our relationship."

"Matoi being her usual self like always.
She'll try to answer everything to the point it's starting to annoy me."

"Always wandering about like that!
Geez!"
"1. Are you jealous?"
"2. Are you lonely?"

"H-Hey!
What are you thinking?
it's not like that!"

"...!
It's not like that!
There's no way I'm lonely!"

"I'm not jealous!
Not even lonely!"

"That girl said that she wanted
to talk to Matoi earlier.
There's nothing wrong with that right?!"

"Mmn? Hey it's Sara
and <%me>!"
"Oh no, they found us!"

"Sara, stop wandering and come here,
let's talk together. <%me> too!"

"Sara, you have stuff you wanted to ask too, didn't you?
Stop hesitating and ask.
Predecessor can answer anything!"
"Even if you say so..."
"Haha~ If it's something that I can answer, you can ask me anything"

"I love talking. I also wanted to
talk to you too, Sara."
"I see..."

"I've always wanted to ask...
You like wearing those types of clothes right?"

"Oh, I'm curious about that too.
You always wore those type of clothes. Is it your hobby? Are they your type?"

"No- I mean- Xiao prepared these
clothes for me!
It's not like I asked him for this!"

"Can you become stronger
by showing off that much skin?"

"No- I wouldn't say that, although...
You can absorb more photons from the atmosphere..."

"Really!
Then, if I reveal more of myself,
I can become stronger right!"

"No- Don't!\u3000Girls shouldn't be exposing soo much!
That's an absolute NO!"
"Look who's talking now, Matoi."

"*Whinges*
I didn't want to be told off by you Sara."

"Come to think of it, Sara's weak even though she's revealing more skin than I am?..
That doesn't matter, does it?"
"Are you looking for a fight here?!"

"<%me>.
Times like this are fun, aren't they?"
